item.title: Trump calls Fed Chair Jerome Powell a 'fool' after central bank keeps rates steady
item.description: The Fed on Wednesday voted to keep its benchmark interest rate in a range of 4.25% to 4.5%, where it's kept it on hold since December.

item.title: Trump offers to help resolve conflict between India and Pakistan
item.description: President Donald Trump called the tensions between India and Pakistan following the massacre in Kashmir "terrible."

item.title: Republican candidate in North Carolina Supreme Court race concedes after judge rejects challenge
item.description: The concession comes two days after a judge rejected his effort to invalidate tens of thousands of ballots.

item.title: Trump pulls surgeon general nominee Janette Nesheiwat after questions about her medical education
item.description: Former Fox News medical contributor Dr. Janette Nesheiwat had been scheduled to appear Thursday for her confirmation hearing before a Senate committee...

item.title: Trump digs in on high China tariffs ahead of trade talks
item.description: China said earlier it will enter upcoming talks in Switzerland with Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent “firmly” opposed to Trump's tariff hikes.
